title: Client DC
body: For the last few days, in just about every game,  I have been disconnecting from the in-game client for 1-2 minutes. My net seems to be fine during these disconnects. Has anyone else been experiencing this problem?

replies.body: We have a few people with the same problem here: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/6xj84NEc-unable-to-connect-to-the-server-please-check-your-network-connection-and-attempt-to-reconnect
